contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1996 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
The Pacemakers
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium Treherbert. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 7 bands competed
March 25, 2015, 9:44 a.m. July 1, 2020, 7:43 a.m.
1 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
2 Llanelli Band Terry Jenkins
3 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
4 Ogmore Valley Silver Band J. Taylor
5 Ystrad Mynach & District Alan Rowe
6 Ynyshir Band F. W. Nicholas
7 Pontardulais Town Band G. R. Lewis
